directions: In a medium skillet over medium-high heat, saute garlic in oil 1 to 2 minutes.  Stir in onion and cook 2 minutes more.  Stir in tomatoes, oregano, basil, salt and pepper.  Reduce heat to medium-low and let simmer.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until al dente; drain.
Toss hot pasta with tomato mixture.  Serve.
title: Pasta Pascal
